longBusinessSummary: Medtecs International Corporation Limited, an integrated healthcare services provider, manufactures and distributes medical consumables for healthcare distributors, pharmaceutical companies, and hospital groups worldwide. The company's Manufacturing segment produces and sub-contracts a range of medical consumables, including patients' apparels, disposable surgical masks, boot covers and surgical gowns, underpads, adult diapers, crochet blankets, bed linens, and medical bandages. Its Hospital Services segment offers laundry and leasing services to hospitals with outsourcing its noncritical functions. The company's Distribution segment markets Medtecs-branded medical consumables to hospitals, pharmacies, and other end users. This segment also supplies other branded medical supplies and equipment comprising wheel chairs, syringes, nebulizers, and blood pressure monitors. In addition, the company manufactures, leases, trades in, and sells woven and knitted medical textile products; trades in hospital textiles and garments, pillow cases, bed sheets, gowns, and other apparel products; provides garters and other garment products; engages in subleasing activities; and manufactures and supplies personal protective equipment. Medtecs International Corporation Limited was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
